item.title: Python a Function Convert Percentage in String/Object Type Columns to Numbers
item.description: Converts percentage information given in String/Object type columns into numbers.

item.title: Python a small Function Convert Boolean Characters to Boolean Type in String/Object Columns
item.description: Converts boolean characters to boolean type if provided as ’t’ or ‘f’ in String/Object type columns.
